title: Farewell Bag Releases New Handlebar Roll and Restocks
content:
Our buddy Eric from Farewell Bags here in Santa Fe just announced the brand’s all-new Handlebar Roll bag and some restocks on classic designs. Let’s check them out.

Handlebar Roll $120

Minimalist handlebar roll for rowdy singletrack cyclobaggin! Well suited for any riser/flat bar bike. It can fit between wide drops, but you’d probably wanna pack it before you install it. Attaches to handlebars via (2) Voile straps. Attaches to frame or steerer via webbing strap with a camlock. The bag is seam-sealed and utilizes XPAC fabric for weatherproofing. Opens on either side for easier access. Features 2 webbing straps to stow tent poles and whatnot. Comes with foam spacers to accommodate tricky setups, help with cable management, and ensure an extra secure attachment.

This bag received accolades from Bailey Newbrey as being the most stable handlebar roll he’s ever used!

Specs:

  • Four colors
  • 23 liter capacity
  • Dimensions: 9.5” diameter x 31” (unrolled) and 22” (with 3 rolls, which seems to work best)
  • 9oz weight

Dos Baguette Tote™ – Drip Camo $110

The Dos Baguette Tote is meant to be used as a daily carry bag. It features one large main compartment, 2 exterior sleeve pockets great for water bottles or baguettes or natty wine and 2 exterior zippered sleeve pockets to secure smaller loose items.

The shell is 1000D Cordura in deadstock “drip camo” with a 400D coyote brown pack cloth liner.

Size is ~15”H x 10”W x 4”D

Atalaya Pack™ – Olive X11 $120

A multi-purpose bag to carry all of your daily essentials, on or off the bike! Attach the included waist/shoulder strap and wear it as a hip pack or sling around town or on day hikes. Sized just right for a full day in the saddle without weighing you down. Constructed with waterproof and durable Dimension Polyant XPAC X11 with a XPAC RVX25 internal liner. This design features a structured, one-piece construction to minimize seams for increased weatherproofing.

Features:

  • Water resistant zipper with large zipper pull for easy opening
  • Side release buckle on removable waist/sling strap
  • Daisy chain for adjustable fit to handlebars
  • Attaches to bike with (2) Voile Nano straps and an adjustable elastic cord lock (included)

Specs:

  • Dimensions: ~ 10”W x 4.25”H x 4.25”D
  • Volume: ~ 2.6 liters
  • Weight: ~ 6oz. excluding waist strap. Waist strap is ~2oz.
  • Waist strap adjustment range: 26” – 46”

Farewell has also restocked its Baked Potato and has some new tweaks to its Stem Bags V2 for this spring launch.

All bags are in stock and shipping today from Farewell.
